turn_knob.description: Turn the knob to adjust coffee settings.

wipe_knob.description: Wipe the knob to keep it clean.

press_toggle_button.description: Press the toggle button to switch the coffee machine.

wipe_toggle_button.description: Wipe the toggle button to keep it clean.

wipe_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the coffee machine body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine including the knob, toggle button and coffee machine body.
